name: Touhou Defense Force
description: Touhou Defense Force is an isometric arena shooter inspired by the Earth Defense Force / Chikyū Bōeigun series or Escape from the Planet of the Robot Monsters. It is also a fangame based on the Tōhō series. The player chooses one from several Tōhō characters. At the start only 2 heroines, Reimu and Marisa, are playable, the others are unlocked later on. The character fight against swarms of giant bugs in cities. When a heroine kills all enemies, the mission is completed and the next level is unlocked. Each character has her own characteristic shooting style. Cities have many buildings to destroy.
